assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The molecular analysis was approved by the French ethics committee (no. IRB00011687; College de neurochirurgie IRB #1: 2022/05) and was performed after parents gave signed informed consent for genetic testing.
